scripts.deploy: dotenv -- bash -c 'npm run build && rsync -avz --exclude-from=.gitignore --exclude .git --include build/\*\*\* --include api-mock/\*\*\* --include app.js ./ $SSH_USER@$SSH_HOST:$SSH_PATH/ && ssh $SSH_USER@$SSH_HOST "cd $SSH_PATH/api-mock && npm install --production"'
scripts.deploy:dry-run: dotenv -- bash -c 'npm run build && rsync -avzn --exclude-from=.gitignore --exclude .git --include build/\*\*\* --include api-mock/\*\*\* --include app.js ./ $SSH_USER@$SSH_HOST:$SSH_PATH/'
